title: Watch Dale Earnhardt Jr. take Mark Zuckerberg for a ride at Charlotte Motor Speedway
text:
Mar 14, 2017 at 8:29p ET 0Shares 
Dale Earnhardt Jr. took Mark Zuckerberg for a spin on Monday â€” not quite as quick as high-speed internet. The journey around Charlotte Motor Speedway with the Facebook co-founder wound up on Facebook live. 
Check it out, and there is some NSFW commentary. 
Live from Charlotte learning about NASCAR with Dale Earnhardt Jr., and then going for a quick drive. 
Posted by Mark Zuckerberg on Tuesday, March 14, 2017
